DOC.brief_title: Intraoperative Use BP Device Detecting Positive Margins During Lumpectomy Procedure
DOC.detailed_description: Use device take place partial mastectomy procedure ( lumpectomy ) .The patient randomize enter device control arm .
DOC.criteria: Inclusion criterion 1 . Women diagnose carcinoma breast 2 . Undergoing lumpectomy ( local wide excision ) procedure . 3 . Over 18 year age 4 . Signed ICF Exclusion criteria 1 . Neoadjuvant systemic therapy 2 . Previous radiation operate breast 3 . Prior surgical procedure quadrant 4 . Implants operate breast 5 . Pregnancy 6 . Participating investigational study either drug device influence collection valid data study .
